website_summaries.verdict: Excellently designed, the Beyerdynamic MMX 300 is the best-sounding wired gaming headset we've ever tested.
pros: Fantastic sound with excellent range, balance, and stereo separation
Two cables, both with inline remotes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I don’t what the big thing is with these headphones, but the sound is nowhere near the Sennheiser open backed ones at half the price! They suck to your head and I had a headache after an hour. I had to take them off and swapped them back to my Sennheiser’s .....there is no comparison. Unfortunately I cannot send these back as it’s too late ....but please don’t waste your money. I’m going to have to sell them privately now. They are just awful. Sound was so low and it was full up. Horrible headset. Sennheiser all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: The best for gaming, but more than that.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for about 210 euro, which is a steal. They are worth every penny, I bought and use them along with Syba USB 2.0 amp/dec. This is the best quality of sound in closed headphones you can get anywhere in that price range, or even for 300 euro. This is not your standard overpriced garbage branded as gaming, these are just great headphones for everything. Only downside, the cushions aren't the best, but they are good. (and you can always replace them)
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Grzywacz

customer_reviews.title: Staggering sound but unable to hear own voice
customer_reviews.text: Used for Call of Duty - sound is staggeringly detailed, way better than my Sennheiser Gaming headset (both paired with an Astro Mixamp Pro). However the closed back made it almost impossible to hear my own voice when talking into the microphone and couldn't hear the wife's either (which made her rather unhappy). Furthermore the microphone appeared to fail after a few days so returned them. Maybe I just had a dud pair, but I'm going to have to think hard about whether I want to trade off stunning sound for an inability to hear my own voice.
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review of the MMX 300
customer_reviews.text: Short review, i don't believe in wasting time. 1) How do they sound? Like a pair of DT770 but have a wider soundstage, so sound great. 2) Are they comfy? NO! They basically press on your upper jaw and can cause pain after an hour or so. 3) Any Issues? The cables are terrible, the mute switch makes an auditable click down the mic, the volume pot is channel inconsistent and the microphone is loose and not secure in the rotary hinge. I sent them back as at this price i could have gone DT770/990 with a modmic or standalone and had a much better QC expedience.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable with good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most comfortable headset I've ever owned. I seem to get through alot of headsets and this is the nicest one to wear for long periods. The sound quality is good enough, definitely not the best I've heard, I'd say its on par with the custom one pro. My only issue is if the cable breaks it doesn't look like you could replace it with a normal cable and replacements will probally cost alot. Most headsets usually die around the little in line controller so I hope this one lasts abit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Olli

customer_reviews.title: The best wired stereo headset.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best stereo headset you can buy. Exceptional mic. Very clear and specious sound. Clamping force when opening in the hands feels like it would be quite high but once you get it on it's fine for hours at a time. Good at isolating outside noise. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. J. Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, a little expensive but great quality, the microfone is awesome, the headset is light and comfortable. First two days you might feel weird like volume is low but then is high enough you get used to it, I don’t have the headaches I was having with my g633.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Metz

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to get a good quality second hand version from Amazon and they are great, I use these with my Astro mixamp for streaming chat on consoles and pc. The mic is the shiz and works well with the astro mixamp noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sweetman

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset is the best one i ever had for my computer. You get an excellence quality for your money. For music and gaming = amazing. In couple with a good soundcard you should get the best performance out from it.
customer_reviews.author: Privat

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming, music and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this headset feels like I'm using cheats as it's so easy to pinpoint where enemies are coming from. Love the sound signature of these with crisp treble and bass that adds gentle warmth. Knocking off a star since the mute switch doesn't work but it doesn't really bother me. Also comes with a 1/8 inch to 1/4 inch adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: This headset has caused me nothing but trouble. I had to Google why the sound wasn't working and turns out I had to basically force the cable into the left ear as hard as I possibly could. Additionally, turns out my mic randomly crackles on the receiving end for no reason at all and is now too late to return... thanks for the bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply brilliant. Solid microphone, amazing comfort, perfect headphone clamping force. Nice and bassy strong lows, clear mids and fantastic highs. Don't get the other gaming headsets because most gaming headsets are not the best headsets for gaming ironically.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mills

customer_reviews.title: Really good after changing the earpads.
customer_reviews.text: Changed to the Dekoni earpads and made a huge difference in the sound. They now sound like high end headphones at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr M Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is far out the best headset I've ever owned . Crysrsl clear sound , easy to hear footsteps in games and really really good all-around headset for all kinds of media. Purchased mine at 169 euro and it's worth every penny. Highly recommend ...
customer_reviews.author: Jonas A.

customer_reviews.title: Gaming headset with Audiophile grade technology
customer_reviews.text: After using gaming headsets for years, I thought it was finally time to up my listening game. After doing a lot of research, Zeos Review of these, I had no other option but to buy these straight away. Not only is the mic of high quality but the audio is a massive step up.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfy

customer_reviews.title: Solid gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had many headphones used mainly for gaming. This one so far the best I ever had. Closed design do you wont hear noise around you and u can focus on game. Perfect fit and very confortable even after lomg session. To connect cable to headphones you have to use significant power. Mute button very useful. Microphone is very accurate. I can recommend this headphones to everybody. All this reflect price
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, Overwatch with these + Dolby Atmos is ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, Overwatch with these + Dolby Atmos is freekin awesome. Music is also very detailed, mic works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hoor Maister

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but damaged in transit.
customer_reviews.text: The headband was bent from out of the box. Very uncomfortable and I couldn't bend it back. Im guessing from the mic while in transit. Sound was great and seamed like a very comfortable headsey if it was bent.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Mute button doesn't work and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Tried plugging it directly and using a DAC -- both achieved subpar results. Additionally, the mute toggle button did not work properly. Returned it after 2 hours of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: headphones
customer_reviews.text: head phones worked perfectly from the minute i put them on. sound has got better since they have been used for 40 hours plus
customer_reviews.author: david moore

customer_reviews.title: They worth the price tag, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound awsome for gaming, took me a few hours to tweet the sound though to get it right. The mic sounds amazing to a friend thought I sounded like I was on the radio.
customer_reviews.author: leon day

customer_reviews.title: Headphones are good BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The headphone audio quality is good, (as expected) however I have two problems with it, 1. The directional sound isn't too good, I can hear sounds and understand the general area, but its very difficult for me to hear and know where a sound is coming from. 2. The microphone on the headphones do work, however, they do not live up to the quality that was shown on a few youtube videos
customer_reviews.author: Caiden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best headset and sound that you can buy with a 5 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: a caparelli

customer_reviews.title: More than just a gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for conference calls and was amazed at the sound quality which is better than any headphone I’ve ever used. The quality of the microphone is also excellent. I’ve worn these all day at times and found them to be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mr m hall

customer_reviews.title: Great build but disappointing volume on xbox and phone
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, really sturdy headset but far too quite on xbox one and mobile device! My old hyperx cloud stinger is kicking out more volume than these, really disappointing for the price will be sending back
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Marvesley

customer_reviews.title: A headset that adds FUN to your gaming...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Game zeros, A50’s and top of the range turtle beach’s and it has to be said...none of them touch this headset. The sound stage is awesome, the bass is fun and they are comfy. They don’t require an amp, just plug in and away you go.
customer_reviews.author: Raymondsworld

product_meta.title: Beyerdynamic MMX 300 (2nd Generation) Premium Gaming Headset
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Gaming HeadsetHigh-tech for your ears. Extremely clear, three-dimensional and powerful sound. More and more professional gamers are raving about the MMX 300 Premium Gaming Headset. Amazing sound, outstanding speech intelligibility and extreme comfort will give you an unbeatable advantage against the competition.

BOX CONTAINS
Y-extension cable for PC, 6 design covers, Detachable headset with cable remote control
feature_bullets: Closed headset with cable remote control - made in Germany
Optimum sound for gaming and multimedia applications on PC and console
Outstanding speech intelligibility on account of high-quality microphone capsule
Super soft microfibre ear pads for a comfortable fit allowing you to wear the headset for hours on end
Incl. protective carry case, 6.35 mm jack adapter and 1.5 m Y-extension cable

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
